channel.title: Help please = skype chat please!
channel.description:
I really want to make a private server and i cant do it i have followed over 1thousand guides and all i want is a private server with lots of cool items and chaotics and god swords if that would be okay skype me asap :: skype name :: jackthejazz
also if i can make it and you tell me what to download and ill do everything you say thatd be cool :) thnx !!

item.title: Help please = skype chat please!
item.dc:creator: @Bandos1337 Bandos1337
item.description:
@Bandos1337 wrote:

Well, I cant help you with portforwarding since i just host it on a remote server (since portforwarding could be a security risk), but making a client would probably be too muh work for someone whos just starting, you can download the client from the Server Downloads page or decompile the runescape client and use that… Once you have a client, just find the place to change the IP (probably client.java and Applet_sub1.java or whatever) and change it to 127.0.0.1.

Read full topic

item.title: Help please = skype chat please!
item.dc:creator: @jackthejazz jackthejazz
item.description:
@jackthejazz wrote:

Bandos1337:

well, i do HAVE a server with all that, that im giving up on (a 317, giving up because im moving to a 614), but im not quite ready to release the source yet. Maybe I will give the source to you, though… What are you having trouble doing? Getting the server to run? Hosting it? I’d first need to know what you need help on.

well i dont know how to do anything if you could ge skype and we could talk it be a lot easier but ill tell you the basic’s
i cant physicly make a client and do not know how to set up the downloadable ones
i cant make a server or anything

what i need
a good server with the ::item command would be cool and all the stuff i said
for me and my friend to be able to go on it through hamachi or with a hosting compay if you can tell me how

Read full topic

item.title: Help please = skype chat please!
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:2, topic:398481”]Your asking for far too much help, if you offered a fair fee many people would teach you/ set it up for you but your not.
Sorry but very few peoples kindness extends that far.[/quote]

You’re not allowed to pay for help-as the rules say.

Read full topic
